title: Ep 208 | Jase's Latest Brush with the Law, Phil Drops Some Serious Kingdom Truths & the Messy Church
description:
Jase has yet another encounter with law enforcement, and frankly, Phil can see why. Phil lays out exactly what it means that "the kingdom of heaven is near," and he's got all the verses to back it up. Jase talks about the greatest comeback story in the history of comeback stories. The guys start their study of Acts, discuss the messiness of the church, and explain why following Jesus is a movement, not a monument. And Zach gets some unexpected encouragement from Phil and Al.
